price: So wünsche nichts gegen sie zu beschleunigen; Wir zählen ihnen schon (die Tage) ab.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
